feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas late in the evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Windy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
